questions.context: Direction: Read the e-mail below.From: Eagle Fitness CenterTo: Glendale Apartment ResidentsSubject: Relocation of Eagle Fitness CenterSent: May 3, 01:20 P.M.Dear residents,We are scheduled to relocate our fitness center closer to your apartment complex and hope to provide better service to you. If you have any good ideas about how we can improve our facilities, please let us know. We will try to apply them to our fitness center.Thank you,Eagle Fitness CenterDirections: Respond to the e-mail as if you are a resident in the Glendale apartment complex. In your e-mail, give TWO suggestions regarding the facilities and ask one question.

emailDetails.subject: Relocation of Eagle Fitness Center
emailDetails.content: Dear residents,We are scheduled to relocate our fitness center closer to your apartment complex and hope to provide better service to you. If you have any good ideas about how we can improve our facilities, please let us know. We will try to apply them to our fitness center.Thank you,Eagle Fitness CenterDirections: Respond to the e-mail as if you are a resident in the Glendale apartment complex. In your e-mail, give TWO suggestions regarding the facilities and ask one question.

questions.context: Direction: Read the e-mail below.From: Alpha ToursTo: Advertising List Subject: Package Family TourSent: July 3, 12:45 P.MAlpha Tours is offering a family package to Bali for this upcoming summer vacation. Our package includes hotel accommodation, airfare, and much more. For more information, please contact us via email at touragent@joy.comDirections: Respond to the e-mail as if you are a customer that is interested in the package. In your e-mail, ask for three pieces of information about the package tour.

emailDetails.subject: Package Family Tour
emailDetails.content: Alpha Tours is offering a family package to Bali for this upcoming summer vacation. Our package includes hotel accommodation, airfare, and much more. For more information, please contact us via email at touragent@joy.comDirections: Respond to the e-mail as if you are a customer that is interested in the package. questions.context: There are some people who like to work alone. Others prefer to work with coworkers. What are some advantages and disadvantages of working with coworkers in a team? Give specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
